directions.content: Click the response with the correct noun clause for each question. Click Submit to check your answers.

question.content: What movie is she going to see?

option.content: I don't know where she is going to see the movie.
I don't know what movie she is going to see.
I don't know when she is going to see the movie.

question.content: Do you know where the art class is?

option.content: I'm not sure where the art class is.
The art class is on the second floor.
I'm not sure when the art class begins.

question.content: How are you getting to the recital?

option.content: I don't know where the recital is.
I don't know when the recital is.
I'm not sure how I am getting to the recital.

question.content: When are your parents coming home?

option.content: I don't know where my parents went.
I don't know when my parents are coming home.
I don't know what my parents are doing.

question.content: Where are you going to college?

option.content: I don't know if I am going to college.
I haven't decided where I am going to college.
I'm not certain when I am going to college.
